RPBA01
Pokemon Battle Revolution

Regionfree Button Activator Mastercode [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
A00304D2 2C000000
D200001C 00000002
80030000 3D808000
900C1500 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*must be on to use regionfree button activator(s)*

Regionfree Button Activator [Bully@Wiiplaza]
28001502 YYYYZZZZ

Profile Name Changer [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
7FA5EB78 389F0218
D2000088 00000013
38C000XX B0C40000
38C000XX B0C40002
38C000XX B0C40004
38C000XX B0C40006
38C000XX B0C40008
38C000XX B0C4000A
38C000XX B0C4000C
38C000XX B0C4000E
38C000XX B0C40010
38C000XX B0C40012
38C000XX B0C40014
38C000XX B0C40016
38C000XX B0C40018
38C000XX B0C4001A
38C000XX B0C4001C
38C000XX B0C4001E
38C000XX B0C40020
38C00000 B0C40022
7C661B78 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XX = ASCII*
*Fill out unused XX Values with 00*
*Connect to WFC to apply the new name*

Weather Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
7C832A14 80C42DC0
D2000024 00000002
3C00XXXX 6000XXXX
90030180 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XXXX Values*
00000000 = clear weather
00000002 = rain
00000004 = sandstorm
00000010 = sun
00000040 = hail
00005000 = gravity
00008000 = fog
00050000 = trick room

Weather Lasts Forever [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
801E0008 901E000C
D2000010 00000002
38000063 901E0184
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Enemy Statusproblem Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
7C70F214 80032DAC
D2000004 00000002
380000XX 90032DAC
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XX Values*
Nothing = 00
Sleeping = 04
Burned = 10
Frozen = 20
Paralysed = 40
Poisoned = 80

380000XX 90032DAC
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Nothing = 00
Sleeping = 04
Burned = 10
Frozen = 20
Paralysed = 40
Poisoned = 80

Add Friendpasses to Battle Pass Selection [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008100
508007BE 90030360
D2000030 00000004
3D808000 A18C1502
2C0C1000 4082000C
3800003D 98030350
80030350 00000000
*Must use regionfree button activator mastercode*
*Hold minus while entering the selection screen*
